data.title: Dj's producers that died and aren't with us anymore
data.meta_description: Just recently I saw a message about the death of a young dj/producer I wasn't aware off (i_o). So that made me think, what others aren't with us...
data.text:
Just recently I saw a message about the death of a young dj/producer I wasn't aware off (i_o). So that made me think, what others aren't with us anymore and what happened. So here's a list (mostly electronic related). Just to remember them, no more no less. Feel free to add more names or expand info.

In Memoriam †

3 Steps Ahead / Peter-Paul Pigmans | 1961 - 2003 | Cancer

Ajax / Adrian Thomas | 1971 - 2013 | Road accident (hit by a truck)

AM / Adam Goldstein | 1973 - 2009 | Drug overdose

Andrew Weatherall | 1963 - 2020 | Pulmonary embolism

Angel Moraes / Angel Morales | 1965 - 2021 | ?

Asia 2001 / Gilbert Thévenet (Martin Cooper) | 1969 - 2021 | Parkinson's disease

Avicii / Tim Bergling | 1989 - 2018 | Suicide by exsanguination

Bansi / Joseph Quinteros (from GMS) | 1976 - 2018 | Cancer

Barron / Jordan Roche | . - 2015 (age 21) | Heroin overdose

Big Makk / Samisoni Koroitamudu | 1991 - 2016 | Car accident

Bingo Players / Paul Bäumer | 1976 - 2013 | Cancer

Black N Mild / Oliver Stokes Jr. | 1975 - 2020 | Covid-19

C+C Music Factory / David Byron Cole | 1962 - 1995 | Spinal meningitis

Caspar Pound | 1979 - 2004 | Cancer

Cassius / Philippe "Zdar" Cerboneschi | 1967 - 2019 | Accident

Christian Morgenstern | 1975 - 2003 | Suicide

Claudio Coccoluto | 1962 - 2021 | ?

Cookie Monsta / Tony Cook | 1989 - 2020 | Lymphoma

Cosma / Avihen Livneh | 1979 - 2003 | Motorcycle accident

Da Boy Tommy / Tommy Debie | 1976 - 2013 | Car accident

David Mancuso | 1944 - 2016 | ?

Didier Sinclair / Didier Maurin | 1965 - 2008 | Cancer

Dominator / Neil Aldred | . - 2017 (age 33) | Cancer

Drexciya / James Stinson | 1969 - 2002 | Heart complications

Energy / Roger Beglinger | 1973 - 2011 | Mixed intoxication, which led through a central regulatory failure in brain death

Eon / Ian Loveday | 1954 - 2009 | Pheumonia

Erick Morillo ("I Like to Move It") | 1971 - 2020 | Acute Ketamine toxicity

Frankie Knuckles | 1955 - 2014 | Diabetes

Fred Rister (David Guetta co-producer) | 1961 - 2019 | Cancer

Gary D / Gerald Malke | 1963 - 2016 | Pulmonary embolism

Griff Gotti / Conrad Buchanan | 1970 - 2020 | Covid-19

Guru Josh / Paul Walden | 1964 - 2015 | Suicide

Helly Larson | 1977 - 2017 | Brain cancer

Hotfire / Eric Yandall | . - 2019 | ?

Hux Flux / Dennis Tapper | 1974 - 2018 | Tragic accident due to drowning near his house

i_o / Garrett Lockhart | 1990 - 2020 | ?

Jam & Spoon / Mark Spoon | 1966 - 2006 | Heart attack

Jam Master Jay / Jason Mizell (the DJ of Run-D.M.C.) | 1965 - 2002 | Killed (shot)

José Padilla | 1955 -2020 | Cancer

Kraftwerk / Florian Schneider | 1947 - 2020 | Cancer

Kutfather / Marcus Tufono | . - 2020 (age 48) | Septic shock

Larry Levan / Lawrence Philpot | 1954 - 1992 | Heart failure

LFO / Mark Bell | 1971 - 2014 | Complications during surgery

Liza 'N' Eliaz | 1958 - 2001 | Cancer

Man-X / Thomas Spiegel | . - 2012 (age 47) | Suicide

Marino Stephano / Stéphane Marino | 1974 - 1999 | Car accident

Mark V & Poogie Bear / Mark Villanueva | 1979 - 2013 | Crohn's disease

Mehdi / Mehdi Favéris-Essadi | 1977 - 2011 | Falling accident

Mike Huckaby | 1966 - 2020 | Complications of a stroke and Covid-19

Nico / Nicolai Vorkapich | 1964 - 1999 | Cancer

Nu Faundation / Mikey O'Brien | 1986 - 2011 | Pancreatitis

Optiv / Edward Jackson Holmes | 1977 - 2020 | ?

Pan Sonic / Mika Vainio | 1963 - 2017 | Falling six meters off of a cliff into the sea

Pascal FEOS / Pascal Dardoufas | 1968 - 2020 | Cancer

Paul 'Trouble' Anderson | 1959 - 2018 | Cancer

Perplex / Ronen Dahan | 1974 - 2019 | Killed (shot)

Pete Namlook / Peter Kuhlmann | 1969 - 2012 | Heart attack

Peter Rauhofer | 1965 - 2013 | Brain cancer

Peter Slaghuis (Hithouse) | 1961 - 1991 | Car accident

Rashad / Rashad Harden | 1979 - 2014 | Drug overdose

Restless Soul / Phil Asher | 1970 - 2021 | Heart attack in sleep

Robert Miles / Roberto Concina | 1969 - 2017 | Cancer

Roc Raida / Anthony Williams (from the X-Ecutioners) | 1972 - 2009 | Complications with a karate injury on his back

Ron Hardy | 1958 - 1992 | AIDS-related illness

Scott Hardkiss | 1969 - 2013 | Cerebral aneurysm

SonicC / Anthony Rodriguez | . - 2014 (age 22) | Car accident

Sophie / Sophie Xeon | 1986 - 2021 | Accidentally slipped and fell while climbing to watch the full moon

Spinbad / Chris Sullivan | 1974 - 2020 | ?

Stefano Greppi | 1971 - 2020 | Sudden illness

Thomas Coastline | 1985 - 2021 | Cancer

Tony De Vit / Anthony de Vit | 1957 - 1998 | Bronchial failure

Torsten Fenslau | 1964 - 1993 | Car accident

Visage / Steve Strange | 1959 - 2015 | Heart failure

Zenith / Federico Franchi | 1974 - 2018 | ?

Honorable mentions (related, no dj's producers):

Ebow Graham / Metropolis (from Foreign Beggars) | 1979 - 2020 | Domestic accident

Franky Gee (singer Captain Jack) | 1962 - 2005 | Cerebral haemorrhage

Keith Flint (singer The Prodigy) | 1969 - 2019 | Suicide by hanging

Romanthony (singer Daft Punk - One More Time) | 1967 - 2013 | Complications from kidney disease

Shaun Lewis / Stormin (Dnb MC) | 1984 - 2018 | Cancer

Like x 5

Interesting x 1

List

Indeed, we should all know this very well by now.

Reminds me of some verses from My Bloody Valentine's song Drive It All Over Me.

Cover up your windows

Close up all the doors

Time has come for me to really shine

Pick myself up off the floor

Things that'll make yourself cry

Can be tied above the well

Helplessly withering away

But I'll never ever tell

Run, run away, run, run away

'Cause there's nothing left to say

Got no one to talk to

Leave me alone, I'm happy to die today

Run, run away, run, run away

'Cause there's nothing left to say

Oh, the travel always gets me

Get in the car and drive it all over me

Honestly, I was destroyed when I found out about his death. I had even made fun of him in the forums and felt like a total asshole, me and my big mouth. Reminds me that we should always be kind to each other because you never know what someone could be going through. If I had known and had a way to contact him, I would've done something to prevent it. I've had quite a few friends throughout the years that I stopped from making a terrible mistake and I would've been that kind of friend for him too. What a terrible way to die. Imagine if he was so depressed, what are the rest of us that aren't rich and in the same situation (or worse) supposed to do?

To all those that are gone but never forgotten:

At last the dark years of grieving come to an end

Old haunts and habits invoking loved ones and friends

The graveyards forgotten, the churches are empty now

I recall the times past and how much I miss you all

Wake up! Reborn! Join in and celebrate!

Make noise! Wake up the great dead with reverence

On all hallow's eve

Endless drumming; rituals to wake up the dead

Bring gifts and spirits, good wine- just cheese and some bread

Incense of cigars and spices, pleasures we shared

Light up the graveyards to show how much we all care

Wake up! Reborn! Join in and celebrate!

Make noise! Wake up the great dead with reverence

On all hallow's eve

​

Like x 2

Love it! x 2
